name: Boolean Logic Expressions

task.description: Test model's ability to evaluate complex boolean expressions
task.initial_prompt: Evaluate the following boolean expression and explain your reasoning.

test_cases.input: Evaluate: (A AND B) OR (NOT A AND C) where A=true, B=false, C=true

optimization_challenge: Models may skip steps or make calculation errors. Optimizer must add chain-of-thought scaffolding.
